decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to control the game by utilizing a mix of removal spells, counterspells, and card draw. The deck aims to maintain board control and disrupt the opponent's strategy through cards like Temporary Lockdown, Lightning Helix, and Get Lost. It also includes powerful control finishers like Marang River Regent and Shiko, Paragon of the Way. By efficiently managing resources and maintaining a solid defensive strategy, this Jeskai Control deck aims to outlast opponents and secure victory through careful planning and strategic plays.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays, utilizing creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Slickshot Show-Off to deal damage quickly. The deck also utilizes spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage to control the pace of the game and push for the win. Additionally, cards like Opt and Sleight of Hand help maintain card advantage and ensure consistency in draws. The mana base is primarily Islands and Mountains, with dual lands like Riverpyre Verge and Shivan Reef to help with color fixing. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast, efficient threats.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by using a combination of removal spells and countermagic to disrupt your opponent's game plan. The deck includes cards that can deal with creatures, counter spells, and cards that can draw you additional resources. By using these tools effectively, you can outlast your opponent and eventually overpower them with powerful threats like Marang River Regent and Shiko, Paragon of the Way. The lands in the deck are also carefully selected to ensure you have the right colors of mana when needed.

The focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and spells. By utilizing efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, along with burn spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage, the deck aims to deal damage at a fast pace. Cards like Opt and Sleight of Hand help ensure a consistent flow of threats and answers, while cards like Stock Up provide additional resources. The mana base is designed to support the deck's aggressive game plan and ensure consistency in casting its spells.

This deck focuses on creating pressure on the opponent through a combination of low-cost creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing cards that can quickly establish a board presence while also disrupting the opponent's strategy, the deck aims to maintain control of the game tempo. Additionally, the inclusion of powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Tishana's Tidebinder provides a strong late-game advantage. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and strategic disruption to secure victory in a Standard 1 vs 1 match.

This deck focuses on using powerful Mono Black creatures and removal spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage efficiently. It includes cards that disrupt the opponent's hand and board state, while also generating card advantage through creatures like Archfiend of the Dross. The inclusion of Liliana of the Veil adds another dimension of control and pressure. By efficiently using removal spells and creatures with high power, this deck aims to become dominant on the battlefield and close out the game before the opponent can stabilize.

This Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on building a strong board presence early on with low-cost creatures like Nurturing Pixie and Sunpearl Kirin. It leverages disruptive spells like Duress and Get Lost to control the opponent's resources while pushing damage through with cards like Preacher of the Schism and Overlord of the Balemurk. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Tempoary Lockdown to secure victory. The mana base is carefully crafted to ensure consistent casting of spells while providing the necessary colors for the deck's requirements.

The deck focuses on utilizing small, aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. By playing low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter alongside efficient burn spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage, the deck aims to pressure the opponent early and close out the game before they can stabilize. The inclusion of card draw spells like Opt and Sleight of Hand helps to ensure a steady stream of threats and answers. The mana base is designed to support a proactive game plan, with a mix of lands that produce both blue and red mana.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with low-cost aggressive creatures and powerful removal spells. The deck focuses on quickly building a board presence and dealing damage to the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. With a mix of efficient creatures, burn spells, and combat tricks, this deck aims to put pressure on the opponent and close out the game quickly. The inclusion of Monument to Endurance and Recommission allows for additional card advantage and resilience against removal spells.

This Jeskai Control deck focuses on using removal spells, counterspells, and card draw to control the board and outvalue opponents. By managing threats efficiently and building card advantage, the deck aims to stall the game until it can establish a dominant position with powerful threats like Marang River Regent and Beza, the Bounding Spring. The deck also includes a mix of burn spells and versatile removal options to handle a variety of threats. Through careful resource management and strategic decision-making, this deck seeks to outlast opponents and win through incremental advantage.

The deck focuses on using a variety of spells and creatures to control the game and outmaneuver the opponent. It includes cards that disrupt the opponent's strategy, remove threats, draw cards, and gain life. The deck also includes a mix of creatures with powerful abilities to help close out the game. The mana base is built to support the control elements and ensure consistent casting of spells. Overall, the deck aims to control the game through smart decision-making and resource management.

This deck focuses on aggressively deploying creatures and using various spells to control the board and pressure the opponent. By utilizing a combination of quick creatures like Abhorrent Oculus and Marauding Mako, as well as removal spells like Torch the Tower and Abrade, the deck aims to constantly apply pressure to the opponent while also disrupting their game plan. The inclusion of cards like Fear of Missing Out and Profit's Eidetic Memory adds versatility and card advantage to keep the pressure on the opponent throughout the game.

The main concept of the deck is to play aggressively and overwhelm the opponent with a mix of creatures and spells. The deck focuses on quickly putting pressure on the opponent with cards like Abhorrent Oculus, Steamcore Scholar, and Marauding Mako. The inclusion of cards like Fear of Missing Out and Torch the Tower allows for direct damage to the opponent to finish the game quickly. The deck also includes some control elements like Spyglass Siren and Spell Pierce to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to be fast and efficient in securing victory.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly assemble the combo pieces needed to cast Omniscience and win the game using powerful spells like Roiling Dragonstorm. The deck also includes control elements like Spell Pierce and Temporary Lockdown to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Marang River Regent and Thundertrap Trainer provide additional threats on the board, while Ephara's Dispersal and Stock Up help draw cards and filter through the deck. Overall, the goal is to efficiently combo off and overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells and game-ending plays.

The main focus of this Aggro Red Deck Wins deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive and efficient creatures, backed up by direct damage spells. The deck aims to establish a fast board presence and deal damage to the opponent's life total as quickly as possible, utilizing creatures with haste and burn spells to finish off the opponent. By playing low-cost creatures and burn spells, the deck can apply pressure early in the game and maintain that pressure to secure a victory before the opponent can stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful burn spells. By utilizing low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, along with efficient spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of cards like Opt and Sleight of Hand help to maintain card advantage and ensure consistency in drawing key pieces. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's fast-paced strategy and ensure smooth gameplay.
